name: 蒼天月華
summary: Azure Sky Moon Flowers (蒼天月華, Souten Gekka) is a music album by NEUTRAL released on 2008-08-16 (Comiket 74). It is a vocal and instrumental arrange album featuring arranges from Imperishable Night, Fairy Wars and Silent Sinner in Blue.
info:
• 中文名: 苍天月华
  • 发售日期: 2008年08月16日(C74)
  • 录音: =NEUTRAL=
  • 碟片数量: 1
